definitions.definition: To use the foot to kick (usually a ball).
To tread to measure or music; to dance; to trip; to skip.
To set on foot; to establish; to land.
To renew the foot of (a stocking, etc.).
To sum up, as the numbers in a column; sometimes with up.
definitions.example: to foot (or foot up) an account

definitions.definition: The settlings of oil, molasses, etc., at the bottom of a barrel or hogshead.
